hackathon-description-text: Teams will have 24 hours to hack with our sponsors' APIs and services to produce some awesome hacks. The hackathon is not themed and prizes are oriented towards our sponsor's challenges.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The open challenge, goes to the overall best hack. Prize is a MiP Robot each!
Raspberry Pis up for grabs for the best hack to make use of a Leap Motion
More Raspberry Pis for the hack team making the best Twilio hack.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of the Twilio API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Open to any hack that involves communications, prize is Amazon vouchers
Some AR Mini Drones are up for grabs for the best hack to make use of the Bloomberg API.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of the Bloomberg API

hackathon-description-header: Student run Major League Hackathon in Edinburgh
